All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, MakeAction, Rule, SourceFileSet
public class WarRule
extends JarRule
implements MakeAction

Extension to the JarRule that allows you to build a war file.

Constructor Summary

          Create a WarRule specifying the target war file to create.

          Create a named WarRule specifying the target war file to create.

Method Detail

setWebXmlFile

public WarRule setWebXmlFile(java.lang.String webxmlFile)
Sets the web.xml file to use in your war file. This method will set the file as WEB-INF/web.xml in the war file despite the path or name provided.

setContextXmlFile

public WarRule setContextXmlFile(java.lang.String contextFile)
Sets the context.xml file to use in your war file. This method will set the file as META-INF/context.xml in the war file despite the path or name provided.
